features.name: eNotes
features.shortDescription: Keep track of your finances with the eNotes SMS notifications, anytime, anywhere. eNotes keeps you informed about all transactions on your account.

features.name: No Funds Alert
features.shortDescription: Electronic notifications when you have insufficient funds for an attempted debit order
